SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractDAO<T>
The class is responsible for performing database operations related to generic types of objects
Bill
Represents an immutable Bill with details: unique identifier, the associated name, product name, the quantity of the product, and the total price.
BillBLL
The BillBLL class represents the business logic layer responsible for managing bill operations.
BillDAO
The class is responsible for performing database operations related to Bill objects.
Client
Represents a client with a unique identifier, name, and email address.
ClientBLL
Business Logic Layer for Client operations Handles validation and coordinates with the DAO layer
ClientDAO
The class handles database operations for Client objects.
ClientEmailValidator
Validates a Client to ensure that the client's email is valid.
ClientNameValidator
Validates a Client's name, ensuring it is neither null nor empty and contains only letters and spaces.
ConnectionFactory
The ConnectionFactory class provides static methods to create and manage database connections as well as to close related resources.
Main
 
MainFrame
* The MainFrame class is a GUI-based class for displaying data in a table format and allow CRUD operations on them.
OrderBLL
The OrderBLL class provides the business logic for processing orders.
OrderDAO
The class handles database operations for Orders objects.
Orders
Represents an order placed by a client for a product.
Product
Represents a product available in the system.
ProductBLL
The ProductBLL class manages the business logic related to products.
ProductDAO
The class provides database operations for Product objects.
ProductNameValidator
Validates a Product to ensure that its product name is both present and valid.
ProductPriceQuantityVal
Validates a Product to ensure that its price and quantity are not negative.
Validation<T>
A generic class that provides validation mechanisms using a list of Validator instances.
Validator<T>
Represents a generic validator that can validate objects of type T.
ViewBills
The ViewBills class is a dialog based view for displaying bill data in a table format.
